column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I brought my wife and daughter here on Thursday night. They wanted to know what all the hype was about. After we put our name on the list
column2: we only waited about 40 minutes to be seated. Shortly after
column3: my family knew what the hype was about. Lou's simply has the best Chicago Style pizza in all the land! They have a first rate staff and service. The pizza speaks for itself! You can have all the other pizza joints. Lou Malnati's wins hands down every time in my book!
